name: Canada Artificial Intelligence and Data Act (AIDA)
description: Proposed federal legislation (Part 3 of Bill C-27) to regulate high-impact AI systems in Canada. Would have established requirements for responsible AI development and deployment. Bill died when Parliament was prorogued in January 2025.

costs.cost_source: Bill C-27, Digital Charter Implementation Act 2022

embedding_text: Canada Artificial Intelligence and Data Act AIDA. Proposed federal legislation for high-impact AI systems. Risk assessment and mitigation. Transparency and public disclosure. AI Commissioner oversight. Ministerial audit authority. Bill C-27 Digital Charter. Covers all sectors. Penalties up to CAD 25 million. Bill died in Parliament January 2025.
